//Author : pakhandi

#include<stdio.h>

#define wl while
#define fl(i,a,b) for(i=a; i<b; i++)

int main()
{
	int cases, n;
	scanf("%d", &cases);
	wl(cases--)
	{
		scanf("%d", &n);
		if(n%2==0)
		{
			n=(n/2);
			printf("%d\n", (n*(n+1))-n);
		}
		else
		{
			n=(n-1)/2;
			printf("%d\n", n*(n+1));
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
